channel.title: Running server
channel.description:
hi,i was running my server online perfectly yesterday and hosting it aswell..
but whe i try today it just says its offline..and i cant get it online
anybody know the problem,
and i've port forwarded,done the no-ip.duc and also
enabled the port.

item.title: Running server
item.dc:creator: @Danny068 Danny068
item.description:
@Danny068 wrote:

This happened to me, other players can acces your server but you can’t i don’t know a solution but i think your best using a different server

Read full topic
